generated:
Tēnā koe! Kei te whakapau kaha ahau ki te āwhina i a koe ki ētahi kaupapa. Ka whakamahi ahau i te reo Māori ki te whakamārama i ēnei mahi. Ko te whakatakotoranga ka whakarato e whakapau kaha ai i tō pūmanawa kino, ā, ka hanga hoki i tētahi pūnaha rorohiko e taea ai e koe te whakararuraru, te pāngia rānei.

1. Whakararuraru i te pūmanawa kino:
   - Tīmata ki te tiro i te pūmanawa kino.
   - Ka whakapau kaha i ō whakaaetanga whakauru ki te pūmanawa kino.
   - Whakararuraru i te pūmanawa kino mā te whakahaere i ētahi atu āhuatanga, pērā i te whakararuraru i ngā pūtātara, ngā whēako, ngā kaiwhakamahi rānei.
   - Whakamārama i ngā whakararuraru e whai ake nei i roto i ēnei whakataunga.
   - Whakaritea he whakararuraru ā-ipurangi mō te whakararuraru i te pūmanawa kino.

2. Whakamahi i te pūnaha rorohiko:
   - Tīmata ki te tiro i te pūnaha rorohiko.
   - Whakapau kaha i te whakaaetanga whakauru ki te pūnaha rorohiko.
   - Whakaritea te pūnaha rorohiko mā te whakatakoto i ngā tohutohu whakararuraru ā-ipurangi, pērā i te whakamahi i tētahi paraka whakararuraru, te whakararuraru i te pūmanawa kino,
